text: Édison Gabriel Realpe Solís (13 April 1996 – 22 December 2019) was an Ecuadorian footballer who played for L.D.U. Quito. Realpe began his career with Guayaquil City in 2014.Profile at Soccerway On 31 January 2018, Realpe was loaned out to L.D.U. Quito for the 2018 season.Edison Realpe es nuevo jugador de Liga de Quito, eluniverso.com, 31 January 2018 After the loan spell ended, he signed permanently for the club.Edison Realpe renovó con Liga de Quito , 90min.com, 2 January 2019 Realpe was killed in a car accident near Esmeraldas at the age of 23. https://bolavip.com/conmebol/Conmocion-en- Ecuador-por-la-muerte-de-Edison-Realpe-20191222-0020.html ==Career statistics== Club Season League Cup International Total Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Guayaquil City 2014 36 0 — — — — 36 0 2015 9 0 — — — — 9 0 2016 24 0 — — — — 24 0 2017 23 0 — — — — 23 0 Total 92 0 — — — — 92 0 L.D.U.
